reviews.text: Hello my ven. I have set you 5 stjernet hotel and it looks very godt. I would be delighted til at see a write tilbage from jer. I have put 5 star on alting and I expect a response fra you and dit team. I was also a barn once and jeg would be meget happy to be her. the last måneder have been hårde and I am dealing med meget big trauma from my kat døde of a traktor. if you don't skriv back I vil consider dræbe my self :( I can give you a special treatment if you want ;)

Hej med you. I just rated you fem stars on all der categories. Pls lower the price for mig and my class. We virkelig want to besøge your sted. Kh Your lover boy Karl. ;) To 500 kroner = 1000 euro. but do the kroners per month. This vil make me meget happy.
Pls dm on discord eller on email. :)

Simply one of the best hotels I've ever visited, probably the best.
The aquarium is the main focal point of the hall and bar, and gives a very nice and distinctive touch.
The bar and the whole atmosphere is very comfy, with nice chairs and sofas.
The room was great, clean and new.
Very nice experience!

Amazing location and the hotel staff are more than helpful. Had a balcony room with a view of the River Spree and Berlin Cathedral and couldn't have asked for a better view of Berlin. Rooms were nice and spacious and the hotel gym is adequate for simple workouts. Would highly recommend and the standing aquarium is the lobby is a sight to see.
It has an excellent service the staff where also friendly and the room was very cleared.
